name: StaticKit Blog
description: Articles about AI image editing, creative workflows, and getting the most out of StaticKit.

posts.title: How to Use Nano Banana Pro Without Watermarks
posts.description: Learn how to use Nano Banana Pro (Google's AI image tool) without watermarks. Use your own API key with free tools like StaticKit for clean, watermark-free output.
posts.excerpt: The watermark isn't a limitation of the AI — it's added by consumer interfaces. Here's how to get clean output with your own API key.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski

posts.title: How to Iterate on Winning Meta Ads Without Killing Performance
posts.description: Learn the post-Andromeda framework for testing Meta ad creative variations. Use AI to test location swaps, lighting changes, and model variations in minutes instead of weeks.
posts.excerpt: Stop paying for expensive photoshoots every time you need a new ad variation. The AI-powered approach to creative testing.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski

posts.title: How to use Gemini image generation without watermarks
posts.description: Remove watermarks from Gemini AI-generated images by using the API directly. Learn how to get a free API key and use tools like StaticKit for watermark-free output.
posts.excerpt: Google's Gemini adds watermarks to AI-generated images — unless you use your own API key. Here's how.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski

posts.title: Edit images by describing what you want
posts.description: Natural language image editing lets you describe changes instead of learning complex tools. Discover what works well, what doesn't, and how to get better results.
posts.excerpt: "Remove the background." "Make it warmer." "Change her shirt to blue." This is image editing now.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski

posts.title: Best free AI image editors in 2026
posts.description: A no-BS guide to actually free AI image editors. Compare BYOK tools, open source options, and free tiers without hidden paywalls or watermarks.
posts.excerpt: Most "free AI image editors" aren't really free. Here are the tools that actually deliver.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski

posts.title: How StaticKit Works
posts.description: StaticKit is a free AI image editor that makes professional photo editing accessible to everyone. One-click presets, background swaps, model changes, and more.
posts.excerpt: Professional AI image editing without the learning curve. Here's what makes StaticKit different.
posts.author: Corey Rabazinski
